import axios from'axios';const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:8000';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_BASE_URL,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});export const workflowApi={// List all workflows
listWorkflows:()=>api.get('/api/workflows').then(response=>response.data),// Run a workflow
runWorkflow:request=>api.post('/api/workflows/run',request).then(response=>response.data),// Get workflow session
getWorkflowSession:sessionId=>api.get("/api/workflows/sessions/".concat(sessionId)).then(response=>response.data),// List all workflow sessions
listWorkflowSessions:()=>api.get('/api/workflows/sessions').then(response=>response.data)};export const promptApi={// List prompts
listPrompts:tag=>{const params=tag?{tag}:{};return api.get('/api/prompts',{params}).then(response=>response.data);}};export const validatorApi={// List validators
listValidators:()=>api.get('/api/validators').then(response=>response.data)};export const remediatorApi={// List remediators
listRemediators:()=>api.get('/api/remediators').then(response=>response.data)};export const healthApi={// Health check
checkHealth:()=>api.get('/health').then(response=>response.data)};
